Dedalus.algorithms.bruteforce_search module¶

Brute-force search for the best kp-set. This algorithm makes all possible sets of nodes of a specified size and applies the KP-algorithm on them. It hence selects the KPP-set with the best score.

class BruteforceSearch(graph: igraph.Graph)[source]¶

Bases: object

Brute-force search for the best kp-set [EXPAND]

bruteforce_fragmentation(kpp_size, kpp_type) -> (<class 'list'>, <class 'float'>)[source]¶

It searches and finds the kpp-set of a predefined dimension that best disrupts the graph. It generates all the possible kpp-sets and calculates the fragmentation score of the residual graph, after having extracted the nodes belonging to the kpp-set. The best kpp-set will be the one that maximizes the fragmentation of the graph.

Parameters:
  • kpp_size (int) – the size of the kpp-set
  • kpp_type (KeyplayerAttribute.name) – Either KeyplayerAttribute.DF or KeyplayerAttribute.F
Returns:

  • S: [EXPAND]
  • best_fragmentation_score: [EXPAND]
Raises:
  • TypeError – When the kpp-set size is not an integer number
  • WrongArgumentError – When the kpp-type argument is not of type KeyplayerAttribute.F or KeyplayerAttribute.DF
bruteforce_reachability(kpp_size, kpp_type, m=None) -> (<class 'list'>, <class 'float'>)[source]¶

It searches and finds the kpp-set of a predefined dimension that best reaches all other nodes over the graph. It generates all the possible kpp-sets and calculates their reachability scores. The best kpp-set will be the one that best reaches all other nodes of the graph.

Note

m-reach: min = 0 (unreachable); max = size(graph) - kpp_size (total reachability)

DR: min = 0 (unreachable); max = 1 (total reachability)

Parameters:
  • kpp_size (int) – size of the kpp-set
  • m (int) – maximum path length between the kpp-set and the other nodes of the graph
  • kpp_type (KeyplayerAttribute.name) – Either KeyplayerAttribute.mreach or KeyplayerAttribute.DR
Raises:
  • TypeError – When the kpp-set size is greater than the graph size
  • WrongArgumentError – When the kpp-type argument is not of type KeyplayerAttribute.mreach or KeyplayerAttribute.DR
